Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Todo

Class TodoSegmentView

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.view.SegmentView
project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Todo.TodoSegmentView
public class TodoSegmentView extends SegmentView
A view component representing the TodoSegmentView of the application.
